fields.name: Sleight of Hand (1x):
fields.value: Choose a role. You are seen as that role to all investigative abilities. You can not be seen as anything else.

fields.name: Invite List (Charge 100%):
fields.value: Attack and roleblock someone. If they die, they appear alive to the rest of the town. They can not vote, use abilities, or create HNs, but they can speak in whatever chats they have. Their win condition is changed to yours, sans the "living" part. They do not know who you are.

fields.name: Win Condition:
fields.value: Live to see a faction with a majority of it's members dead succeed its win condition.
